channel.title: How do i make a int go up?

item.title: How do i make a int go up?
item.dc:creator: @dbmain dbmain
item.description:
@dbmain wrote:

yes i would like to know how to make something like
if(command.startsWith(“messup”)) {
int times = 0;
String who = command.substring(6);
times++;
sendMessage(“you have messed up “+times+” people”);
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+" just messed up “+who+” bad!";}
}

that is the code i cant get to work i am trying to make it every time the person uses the command (wen they are on not to be stored in ther char files) that number will keep going up. please help.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make a int go up?
